document.full_text: apple inc  is investigating an explosion that killed two people, injured 16 and forced a production halt at a foxconn technology group factory in china said to produce the popular ipad 2.
document.title: apple probes blast at chinese plant
lines_and_colors: apple inc  is investigating an explosion that killed two people, injured 16 and forced a production halt at a foxconn technology group factory in china said to produce the popular ipad 2.
